channel.title: Okay another semi-advanced question
channel.description:
[b]Problem: [/b] how to send more than one line of text to 1 interface
[b]Server Base:[/b] highly mod. hybridscape
[b]Rating:[/b] 6
here is the link to my previous, still unanswered, hard problem http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,47384.0.html
this problem is related, in that i found a new problem while filling out the text on the interfaces. some texts have more than one line of text, but on the interface every line only has one line, and it's double spaced, and no other interface is the line 2, etc. for instance the ranged - bows, skill guide, has ammo - up to rune, under magic bow. not double spaced. like right under that, but i can't seem to figure out how to get it down there, since it obviously doesn't word wrap. so my thinking is that either there is so other interface that i send that will allow me to have 2nd lines, or somehow use a different frame than sendframe126 to send the text, that will put 2 lines.
on npc dialogue, there is different interfaces, that has different locations of text, double spaced, single spaced, different amounts of lines, etc. wonder if there is somehow a different interface that lays over the skill guide interface that has different interface numbers for the text.
or
if there is a sendframeX(string str, string str2, int id) so u can send more than one line of text...where X is the other frame number.
[br][size=1]Posted at: December 08, 2006, 11:34:48 PM[/size][hr]anyone have any ideas on this one? still trying to figure it out... [br][size=1]Posted at: December 09, 2006, 01:40:23 PM[/size][hr]still trying, anyone?

item.title: Okay another semi-advanced question
item.dc:creator: @adam2348 adam2348
item.description:
@adam2348 wrote:

still need help with this…anyone?[br][size=1]Posted on: December 19, 2006, 01:56:25 AM[/size][hr]maybe someone can answer this now?

Read full topic

item.title: Okay another semi-advanced question
item.dc:creator: @adam2348 adam2348
item.description:
@adam2348 wrote:

hmm i’m still trying, i’ve went thru a lot of different frames and interfaces, and even been trying to figure out the confusing client code of one of the open source clients, just to find out how to do this. so i’m not looking for a free ride here…please, see that i’m trying and help me if u know how.

the old gsta:

glabbby bybuabkfbgafsdgafddafsdafd

umm…hmm…i think that was just spam to boost ur posts…admins? wanna check on this?

Read full topic
